unnormalised: Ugh, trying to remember the LaTeX code for binomial coefficients for my son's maths project is a nightmare; I keep mixing up `\binom{n}{k}` and `n choose k`, and frankly, it's giving me flashbacks to my own Class 12 exams back in '98!
normalised: Ugh, trying to remember the L-A-T-E-X code for binomial coefficients for my son's maths project is a nightmare; I keep mixing up backslash binom n k and n choose k, and frankly, it's giving me flashbacks to my own Class twelve exams back in nineteen ninety eight!
